key.name: ensor-scheme
key.description: The preferred Ensor coloring scheme for the user interface.

key.name: accent-color
key.description: The preferred accent color for the user interface.

key.name: font-weight
key.description: The preferred font weight for the user interface. Makes all text bold or light to the user's choice.

key.name: roundness
key.description: The preferred roundness for the user interface. Makes all interface objects as round as the user's choice.

key.name: contrast
key.description: The preferred contrast for the user interface. Makes user interface low, default, medium, or high contrast to the user's choice.

key.name: density
key.description: The preferred UI density for the user interface. Controls the height and size of various UI elements.
